sourcesContent:
// src/pages/AboutPage.tsx import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './AboutPage.css'; const AboutPage: React.FC = () => { return (

The Mind Behind QuranHub

Meet Umer Khan

Founding Engineer | Serial Startup Builder | Innovation Driver

This isn't just another Quran website. This is passion meets purpose. Umer Khan, a founding engineer who has been at the ground floor of multiple successful startups, decided to turn his technical expertise toward something deeply meaningful.

After years of building cutting-edge technology solutions and watching startups grow from ideas to industry leaders, Umer recognized a gap in how people connect with the Quran in our digital age. Not just another app, but an intelligent, emotionally-aware gateway to understanding the holy book.

"I've built systems that handle millions of users, but nothing compares to building something that can change someone's life," says Umer. "QuranHub isn't about complex algorithms – it's about simplicity meeting spirituality."

Why This Project Matters

The Problem

Modern life makes it harder than ever to connect with ancient wisdom in a way that feels personal and relevant.

The Solution

An AI-powered bridge between your emotions and the perfect Quranic guidance you need, right when you need it.

The Vision

Make the Quran accessible to everyone, regardless of where they are in their spiritual journey.

Where Technology Meets Tradition

With extensive experience in building scalable systems and leading technical teams, Umer brings a unique perspective to digital Islamic content. This isn't just another project – it's a culmination of years of startup experience applied to something truly meaningful.

The AI system behind QuranHub might look like magic, but it's built on solid engineering principles that Umer has perfected across multiple ventures. Every line of code serves a higher purpose.

Join the Journey

This is more than a website – it's a mission to reconnect hearts with the Quran in our modern world. Whether you're seeking guidance, comfort, or simply curious about Islam's holy book, you're in the right place.

Start Exploring Get Personal Guidance

Let's Connect

Have thoughts, feedback, or want to collaborate? Umer is always open to meaningful conversations about technology, faith, and building things that matter.

GitHub → LinkedIn →
); }; export default AboutPage;
